title: Curried function
description:
I've just started reading a book about Elm.

Create curried functions, partially apply arguments
note:
```language-zsh
% elm repl
...
> sayHello greeting name = greeting ++ ", " ++ name ++ "!"
<function> : String -> String -> String
> sayHello "Hello" "Yasha"
"Hello, Yasha!" : String
> hoi = sayHello "Hoi"
<function> : String -> String
> hoi "Yasha"
"Hoi, Yasha!" : String
```
